Notes. Key to columns: (1) Identification number from Cocircte et al. (2004). (2) Virgo Cluster Catalog (VCC) number from Binggeli et al. (1985). (3) Other names. (4) Aperture size (Ar = 2Rp) used in the COG analysis. (5) Axial ratio of galaxy measured at the 5sigma isophote. (6) Position angle of the galaxy measured at the 5sigma isophote. (7) Integrated g-band magnitude from the COG analysis. (8) Effective radius in the g band from the COG analysis. (9) Mean surface brightness within Re. (10) Sersic corrected COG total magnitude (Graham et al. 2005). (11) Sersic corrected COG effective radius (Graham et al. 2005). (12) Sersic corrected COG mean surface brightness (Graham et al. 2005). (13) Radius containing 90% of the Petrosian flux. (14) Concentration, c = R90/R50. (15) Consensus morphological type from P. Cocircte et al. (2010, in preparation). (16) Notes on galaxy and/or COG analysis.
a mag arcsec-2.
b Companion modeled and subtracted using GALFIT (Peng et al. 2002).
